mapper.select: select twork.*, lesson.l_name, swork.*, teacher.t_name from twork left join teacher on teacher.t_id = twork.tw_tid left join lesson on lesson.l_id = teacher.t_lesson left join sc_lesson on sc_lesson.l_id = lesson.l_id left join student on student.s_id = sc_lesson.s_id left join swork on swork.sw_wid = twork.tw_id where sc_lesson.s_id = #{studentId} and swork.sw_sid = #{studentId}
